scripts.db:generate: pnpm run db:generate:d1 && pnpm run db:generate:do
scripts.db:generate:d1: pnpm run activity_stream:generate && pnpm run discovery_index:generate && pnpm run static_content:generate
scripts.db:generate:do: pnpm run team_base:generate && pnpm run user_base:generate && pnpm run workout_session:generate
scripts.activity_stream:migrate:local: wrangler d1 migrations apply DB_ACTIVITY_STREAM --local --config wrangler.jsonc
scripts.activity_stream:migrate:staging: wrangler d1 migrations apply DB_ACTIVITY_STREAM --env staging --config wrangler.jsonc
scripts.activity_stream:migrate:prod: wrangler d1 migrations apply DB_ACTIVITY_STREAM --env production --config wrangler.jsonc
scripts.discovery_index:migrate:local: wrangler d1 migrations apply DB_DISCOVERY_INDEX --local --config wrangler.jsonc
scripts.discovery_index:migrate:staging: wrangler d1 migrations apply DB_DISCOVERY_INDEX --env staging --config wrangler.jsonc
scripts.discovery_index:migrate:prod: wrangler d1 migrations apply DB_DISCOVERY_INDEX --env production --config wrangler.jsonc
scripts.static_content:migrate:local: wrangler d1 migrations apply DB_STATIC_CONTENT --local --config wrangler.jsonc
scripts.static_content:migrate:staging: wrangler d1 migrations apply DB_STATIC_CONTENT --env staging --config wrangler.jsonc
scripts.static_content:migrate:prod: wrangler d1 migrations apply DB_STATIC_CONTENT --env production --config wrangler.jsonc
scripts.db:reset:local: pnpm run db:clean:local && pnpm run db:migrate:local && pnpm run db:seed:local
scripts.db:reset:staging: pnpm run db:clean:staging && pnpm run db:migrate:staging && pnpm run db:seed:staging
